post.title: t-mobile's upcoming samsung vibrant (samsung galaxy s)
post.content: anybody excited or getting the samsung vibrant? comes with 720p hd video recording and a 4" screen. for wind customers there's no iphone 4, no htc evo 4g, and no motorola droid x. 3 mega top super powerful smartphones. t-mobile's release of samsung vibrant in july saves me.
